titleStmt.title: An exhortation vnto the gouernours, and people of Hir Maiesties countrie of Wales, to labour earnestly, to haue the preaching of the Gospell planted among them. There is in the ende something that was not in the former impression..
titleStmt.author: Penry, John, 1559-1593.
Waldegrave, Robert, 1554-1604, printer.

notesStmt.note: Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
